text: Karachi Kings (; ) is one of the six teams which plays in the Pakistan Super League (PSL). The team represents the city of Karachi and was founded in 2015. It is owned by the Salman Iqbal (ARY Group). Imad Wasim is the captain of Karachi Kings, while the head coach is Mickey Arthur. == Squad == The Karachi Kings Squad 2019. Types Players Captain Mohammad Rizwan Coach Mickey Arthur Team Members Imad Wasim, Usman Khan, Usama Mir, Khurram Manzoor, Ravi Bopara, Babar Azam, Mohammad Amir, Mohammad Rizwan, Shahid Afridi,Colin Ingram, Joe Denly, David Wiese, Tabish Khan, Mohammad Irfan Jr, Hasan Mohsin, Tymal Mills, Lendl Simmons, Eoin Morgan, Saifullah Bangash, Aaron summers and Sohail Khan ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Karachi Category:Pakistan Super League teams Category:2015 establishments in Pakistan
title: Karachi Kings
